content: day 6 / 24 i can buy myself flowers abbreviations chain - chain tc - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch tlo - third loop only difficulty single_crochet - single_crochet mc - magic_ring time 1 h double_crochet - double_crochet ws - wrong side material yarnart rope hook 3 5 mm rs - right side blo - back loop only increase - increase ex increase double_crochet - increase with double_crochet increase single_crochet - increase with single_crochet written pattern center - yellow round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as the first double_crochet double_crochet 9 slip_stitch flo total 10 note round 1 is followed by a 3d structure of the flower center do not change or cut the yarn yet center 3d modified puff 4 loops on hook flo in each of the double_crochet from round 1 total 9 puffs ij to the first one weave the ends in modified puff instruction 1 insert hook into the first 2 yo again 3 loops stitch yo and pull on the hook up a loop 2 loops on hook 3 insert hook into the same 4 yo and pull stitch yo and through all loops pull up a loop 4 on hook 1 loop on loops on hook hook continue with the next stitches petals petals - pink this part is worked behind the center so round 2 starts in blo of round 1 attach the new yarn to the back loop only of any of the stitches of round 1 rs is facing up for the petals day 6 / 24 i can buy myself flowers difficulty time 1 h material yarnart rope hook 3 5 mm round 2 single_crochet blo chain as the first double_crochet double_crochet blo in the same stitch increase double_crochet blo x 9 slip_stitch blo total 20 round 3 *single_crochet chain as the first double_crochet double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet in the next stitch chain 2 slip_stitch to the same stitch as last double_crochet* slip_stitch to the next stitch repeat from * to * repeat this sequence three more times with the final slip_stitch to the first single_crochet of this round petal tip *slip_stitch to the single_crochet of round 3 sl st to the chain half_double_crochet double_crochet tc all in the next double_crochet tc double_crochet half_double_crochet all in the next double_crochet slip_stitch in the chain x2 chain 2 slip_stitch to the highlighted stitch of round 1 chain slip_stitch to the loose chain from chain 2 x2 8 petals total repeat from * until the end of the round slip_stitch to the first st of the round weave the ends in note slip_stitch to the highlighted stitch of round 1 - slip_stitch to the same loop as in the round 2 hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the flower congratulations you finished the 6th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 18 to go
